sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_itam_workspace.ChangeAssetLifecycleExtPoint</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point sn_itam_workspace.AssetLifecycleExtPoint for Change</description>
        <name>ChangeAssetLifecycleExtPoint</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ChangeAssetLifecycleExtPoint = Class.create();
ChangeAssetLifecycleExtPoint.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	hasAccess: function(table) {
		return new GlideRecordSecure(table).canRead();
	},
	getAssetCI: function(table, assetId) {
		var assetCI = new global.GlideQuery(table).where('sys_id', assetId).selectOne('ci').get();
		return assetCI.ci;
	},
	getJSON: function(assetTable, assetId) {
		var ci = this.getAssetCI(assetTable, assetId);
		if (ci === null) {
			return null;
		}
		var tableName = 'change_request';
		var attrName = 'cmdb_ci';
		var attrSysId = ci;
		var recordCount = new global.GlideQuery(tableName).where(attrName, attrSysId).count();
		var disableButton = !this.hasAccess(tableName) || recordCount === 0;
		return {
			table: tableName,
			title: gs.getMessage('Change'),
			count: recordCount,
			query: 'cmdb_ci.sys_id=' + ci,
			order: 300,
			disable: disableButton,
		};
	},

	type: 'ChangeAssetLifecycleExtPoint',
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-19 13:28:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>35c7dbbbc322301012f6eb1e9840dd5f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ChangeAssetLifecycleExtPoint</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Asset Management Workspace" source="sn_itam_workspace">54b90b435d70f410f87728dca52fcfea</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Asset Management Workspace">54b90b435d70f410f87728dca52fcfea</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_35c7dbbbc322301012f6eb1e9840dd5f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-19 13:32:50</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
